Gauhati University: Highlights

Gauhati institution, or GU, is the oldest institution in North-East India, located in Jalukbari, Gauhati.

The National Assessment and Accreditation Council (NAAC) has graded the university as ‘A’ Grade.

GU offers 42 postgraduate departments and a component college for Engineering and Law.

Gauhati University has more than 350 associated colleges.

Gauhati University: Courses and Fees Structure 2024

Gauhati University provides a number of courses with varying cost structures. The MBA program costs ₹63,170 total. PhD programs cost ₹27,900 in total. MA and M.Com programs cost ₹14,090 each. The M.Sc program costs ₹12,000 total. Certification courses cost ₹11,090.

Gauhati University: Admission 2024

Gauhati University provides undergraduate, postgraduate, and doctorate programs in a variety of fields, including arts, science, commerce, technology, law, and medicine. The admissions process is normally completed entirely online between June and August. The institution also offers remote and online education through the Institute of remote and Open Learning (IDOL).

Admission to undergraduate programs is dependent on the candidate’s academic merit or scores from the university’s entrance exam. Admission to postgraduate programs is based on scores from the university’s Offline Postgraduate Entrance Test (PGET). Admission to PhD programs is determined by the Gauhati University Research Eligibility Test (GURET).

Admission Application Procedure 2024

Visit the official website, onlinegu.in.

Now Click on the application link for your desired course.

Enter your mobile number and your date of birth.

Now, click on the “Start” button located on the page.

Now fill out the application form.

Choose an entrance exam center.

Upload all essential paperwork.

Click the “Submit” button.

Now sit for the entrance exam and await the results.

If you pass the entrance exam, you will be called for the next step in the admission process.

Documents Required

Mark sheet and certificate of 10th, 12th and degree, whichever is applicable

Caste certificate, claiming reservation

Income certificate, if applicable

Transfer Certificate or TC

Gauhati University: Eligibility Criteria 2024

The Eligibility criteria for admission to Gauhati University differ based on the degree and kind of program being pursued. Candidates must have 10+2 or higher secondary education.

Gauhati University: Placements and Top Recruiters 2024

The placement reports for Gauhati University in 2023 have yet to be issued. However, according to the NIRF 2023 statistics, the median package offered to UG (3-year) students in 2024 placements was INR 3.50 LPA. For postgraduate (1-year) students, the median package was INR 4.80 LPA. The top recruiters for 2024 placements were Exposys Data Labs, Axis Bank, Infosys, Hills Cement Company Limited, and Tata Consultancy Services. A total of 129 undergraduate students and 440 graduate students were placed. The undergraduate (4-year) placement rate was 52%, whereas the postgraduate (3-year) placement rate was 100%. Gauhati University: Scholarship

The University awards scholarships to students based on their academic merit and financial need. Students with outstanding merit records in the qualifying test are eligible to apply for the Gauhati University Scholarship.

International Students’ Scholarships

Gauhati University provides government-sponsored scholarships to its international students. All international students seeking admission to Gauhati University with government-sponsored scholarships must first register themselves. Scholarships are then awarded to meritorious students through the Government of India’s Cultural Exchange Programs, known as ICCR. Interested students can apply for scholarships on the ICCR website.

Gauhati University: Hostel Facility

Gauhati University provides a hostel option for its students. The dormitory is located on the college grounds and accommodates both male and female students. The hostel includes all of the current conveniences and services that students need for a comfortable stay. The capacity for Girls is 150 and for Boys is 50.

Conclusion

Gauhati University is a light of higher education in North-East India, offering a diverse range of undergraduate, postgraduate, and doctorate programs. With a strong emphasis on academic performance and overall growth, the institution fosters an inclusive environment in which students can reach their full potential. The institution’s outstanding rankings, broad academic offerings, and successful placement rates demonstrate its dedication to developing future leaders and professionals.

Admission Application Procedure 2024

To successfully complete your 2024 admissions application, follow these specific steps:

Go to the Official Website: To access the official admission portal, go to onlinegu.in.

Choose Your Course: Find and click on the application link for the course you want to enroll in from the homepage. Make sure to choose the right program based on the interests and qualifications.

Put the personal information: Candidates will be asked for their mobile number and date of birth. Since this will be used for verification, please make sure the information you submit is accurate.

Start the Application: Click “Start” once the necessary information has been entered. The application procedure will begin as a result.

Fill out the application: Complete the application form by providing all necessary information, such as your personal details, academic history, and any other pertinent details. Verify accuracy twice to make sure there are no mistakes.

Selecting an Exam Center for Entrance: Choose your favored entrance exam location from the list of choices. Think about picking a convenient location.

Upload the necessary documents: Prepare and submit all required documents, including proof of identity, diplomas from school, pictures and any other files listed in the guidelines. Make sure the files are the right size and format.

Send in the application:

Check the application carefully once all fields have been completed and all files have been uploaded. To complete the application click the “Submit” button.

Admission Test:

The candidate will receive information about the entrance exam schedule after submitting. Follow the guidelines and instructions provided to attend the exam.

Await the result: Results will be made public on the official website after the test. If the candidate is accepted, more details about the subsequent admissions processes—like interviews or document verification—will be sent to him or her.

What kind of programs does Gauhati University offer?

Gauhati University offers undergraduate, postgraduate, and doctorate programs in a variety of disciplines, including arts, science, commerce, technology, law, and medicine.

When does the admissions process usually take place?

Gauhati University’s admissions procedure is normally completed totally online between June and August.

Does Gauhati University provide remote or online education?

Yes, Gauhati University provides remote and online education through its Institute of Distance and Open Learning (IDOL).

What is the application process for postgraduate programs?

Admission to postgraduate programs is determined on the university’s Offline Postgraduate Entrance Test (PGET) scores.
